Bionics.description: Bionics may be given to wounded Astartes to quickly get them back into a combat-ready state, replacing damaged flesh. This is utilized when a Astarte enters a critical state.

Combat Shield.description: A lighter, more maneuverable version of a Storm Shield. Due to its flexibility, Combat Shields leave other hand of a Space Marine free to use other hand-to-hand weaponry.

Exterminatus.description: A weapon of the Emperor, and His divine judgment, this weapon can be placed upon a planet to obliterate it entirely.

Gene Pod Incubator.description: Required to house gene slaves in order to generate new gene seed for the chapter.

Iron Halo.description: An ancient artifact, these powerful conversion field generators are granted to high ranking battle brothers or heroes of the chapter. Bearers are often looked to for guidance by their fellow Astartes.

Narthecium.description: An advanced medical field kit these allow Apothecaries to heal wounds or recover Gene-Seed from fallen Astartes.

Plasma Bomb.description: A special plasma charge, this bomb can be used to seal underground caves or destroy enemy structures.

Psychic Hood.description: An arcane hood that protects Psykers from enemy psychic powers and enhances control of their psychic abilities.

Rosarius.description: Also called the 'Soul's Armour', this amulet has a powerful built-in shield generator. They are an icon of the Imperial Creed and the Emperor's Protection.

Sororitas Medkit.description: A multi-purpose medkit designed to deal with basic battlefield ailments until further medical assistance can be sought.
